template.template: Template VMware vSphere Virtual Machine - vPoller with C client
template.name: Template VMware vSphere Virtual Machine - vPoller with C client

item.name: VMware Tools Sync Time With Host

discovery_rule.name: Filesystem Discovery
discovery_rule.description: Discovery of filesystems on a VMware Virtual Machine

trigger_prototype.expression: {Template VMware vSphere Virtual Machine - vPoller with C client:vpoller-zabbix["-m", "vm.disk.get", "-V", "{$VSPHERE.HOST}", "-n", "{HOST.NAME}", "-k", {#VSPHERE.VM.DISKPATH}, "-p", "freeSpacePercentage"].min(5)}<20
trigger_prototype.name: Less than 20% of free space on {#VSPHERE.VM.DISKPATH} at {HOST.NAME}

trigger.expression: {Template VMware vSphere Virtual Machine - vPoller with C client:cvpoller-zabbix["-m", "vm.get", "-V", "{$VSPHERE.HOST}", "-n", "{HOST.NAME}", "-p", "summary.overallStatus"].iregexp(red,5)}=1
trigger.name: Overall status of Virtual Machine {HOST.NAME} is {ITEM.LASTVALUE}

trigger.expression: {Template VMware vSphere Virtual Machine - vPoller with C client:cvpoller-zabbix["-m", "vm.get", "-V", "{$VSPHERE.HOST}", "-n", "{HOST.NAME}", "-p", "runtime.powerState"].iregexp(poweredOff,5)}=1
trigger.name: Virtual Machine {HOST.NAME} is powered off

trigger.expression: {Template VMware vSphere Virtual Machine - vPoller with C client:cvpoller-zabbix["-m", "vm.get", "-V", "{$VSPHERE.HOST}", "-n", "{HOST.NAME}", "-p", "guest.toolsRunningStatus"].iregexp(guestToolsNotRunning,5)}=1
trigger.name: VMware Tools not running on {HOST.NAME}
